name: C>gobON.LINE
description:
There seems to be a problem with the reality warp, always something new. Who gets to choose all the details anyway.

Brain link into the virtual body of a goblin in gob.ON.LINE.

Do what goblins should. Bug shepherds, spare cows, climb structures, take it all in, equipped with your procedural generated golden goblin gun. Be Careful not to let the gun get out of control though, it's pretty impartial...

-CONTROLS-

WASD, or Arrows - move goblin

Mouse - shoot goblin gun

Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam (GMTK) 2020 .

prompt - Out Of Control.
